Posts.Content: Hi - I also had painful heartburn and my oncologist was able to prescribe something for it. They should be able to help you. I hope it al, goes well for you on Thursday. X
Posts.Title: Does anyone else dislike the Macmillan Brave the Shave campaign?

Posts.Content: Hi - don't worry. I'm 46 and my periods were as regular as clockwork before my diagnosis.  I had chemo before my mastectomy and about2- 3 months in my periods stopped. Chemo was finished in September and I started tamoxifen in December. No periods in between.  I have hot flushes (not sweats yet) but otherwise tamoxifen is going ok.  I start radiotherapy in the next few weeks. X
Posts.Title: Choice of medication?
